data.text: Tete Yehowa gblɔ nam be, “Ne Mose kple Samuel tsi tsitre ɖe ŋkunye me gɔ̃ hã la, nye dzi matrɔ ɖe dukɔ sia ŋuti o. Eya ta, nya wo ɖa le ŋkunye me. Na woadzo!
Ke ne wobia wò be, ‘Afi ka miayi hã’ la, gblɔ na wo be, ‘Ale Yehowa gblɔe nye esi:
Yehowa be, “Maɖo nugblẽla ƒomevi ene ɖe wo: yi be wòawu ame, avu be wòahe wo adzoe, dziƒoxeviwo kple anyigbadzilã wɔadãwo be, woavuvu wo eye woatsrɔ̃ wo.
Mawɔ wo woanye ŋunyɔnu na anyigbadzifiaɖuƒewo le nu si Hezekia ƒe vi, Manase, Yuda fia wɔ le Yerusalem ta.
Yehowa be,
Ègbe nu le gbɔnye,
Magbɔ wò kple nugbɔnu le anyigba sia ƒe agbowo nu.
Mana woƒe ahosiwo nasɔ gbɔ wu ƒutake.
Nu ate vi adre dzila ŋu, eye wòaɖe asi le eƒe luʋɔ ŋu.
Danye, baba be nèdzim.
Yehowa be,
“Ɖe ame ate ŋu aŋe gayibɔ alo akɔbli si tso anyiehea?
“Wò nu xɔasiwo kple wò kesinɔnuwo la,
Mana nànye kluvi na wò futɔwo
O Yehowa, èse egɔme eya ta ɖo ŋku dzinye
Esi wò nyawo va la, meɖu wo,
Nyemenɔ anyi ɖe aglotulawo ƒe hame kpɔ loo
Nu ka ta nye vevesese nu mele tsotsom o
Eya ta ale Yehowa gblɔe nye esi:
Mawɔ wò nànye gli na ame siawo
Maxɔ wò le ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ƒe asi me,
